name: adblock-detector-bypass-updated
description: A chrome extension that removes obtrusive popups that prevent you from viewing webpage content when an adblocker is detected.

scripts.crx: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force temp_build -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType Directory temp_build | Out-Null; Get-ChildItem -Exclude 'node_modules','build','temp_build','.git','*.pem','package*.json','README.md' | Copy-Item -Destination temp_build -Recurse; & 'C:\Users\Klaus\AppData\Roaming\npm\crx3.cmd' 'temp_build' '-p' 'key.pem' '-o' 'build\AdBlock-Detector-Bypass-updated.crx'; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force temp_build"
